name: The Apache
declaringWar: You've encroached on our lands for far too long!
attacked: You will never destroy our way of life!
defeated: You have worn out my people enough... that I must, surrender...
introduction: As long as you don't hurt my people, and don't steal our land, we'll have no issues.
hateHello: You are an evil that walks the earth.
tradeRequest: Will you accept this offer?
uniqueName: Once They Moved Like the Wind
uniques: No movement cost to pillage
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills <when at war>
[+10]% Strength <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>

name: The Purépecha
declaringWar: The time has come for you to join us.
attacked: You will be killed for your treachery!
defeated: I have failed you Curicaueri.
introduction: Greetings traveler. I am Tariácuri, and I have been sent by the gods to form a unified Purépecha state.
tradeRequest: Would you accept this offer friend?
uniques: Starts with [Mining]
[-10]% construction time for [Mine] improvements

name: Lan Xang
declaringWar: It is with great regret that I must inform you we are at war.
attacked: I will defend my kingdom against invaderssuch as yourself!
defeated: I may yet find peace...
introduction: Greetings, we hope you are a peaceful people. I am Fa Ngum, King of Lan Xang Hôm Khao.
hateHello: Please leave, we don't want you to cause any disturbances.
tradeRequest: Would any of our offers interest you?
uniqueName: One Million Elephants and a White Parasol
uniques: [+50]% Natural religion spread [in annexed cities]
Comment [[+1 Food] in capital for every 2 of your non-Capital cities following your religion]
[+1 Food] [in capital] <for every [2] [[{non-[Capital]} {in cities following our religion}] Cities]> <in [Your] cities> <hidden from users>

name: The Philippines
declaringWar: The engaging of this warfare is not only desirable, but absolutely essential to the welfare of the Philippine Islands
attacked: The Philippine Islands will not fall!
defeated: Your conquest of this land will go down as a great treachery in the history of the world. Of this, I am sure
introduction: Good day, I am Emilio Aguinaldo, President of the great Philippine Islands. What business have you here?
hateHello: Your treachery does not go unnoticed.
tradeRequest: What do you say to this?
uniques: [+10]% [Faith] [in all cities] <upon declaring friendship> <for [4] turns>
[+15]% [Culture] [in all cities] <upon entering a Golden Age> <for [4] turns>
[+1 Faith] in cities on [Coastal] tiles <upon discovering [Astronomy] technology>

name: Francia
declaringWar: It is necessary now that you must join us.
attacked: You now will face the full might of the Lord and my army!
defeated: If the Lord wills it. I will accept this defeat.
introduction: Welcome to the Kingdom of the Franks, I am Charlemagne, and I protect my people.
tradeRequest: Would you accept this offer my friend?
uniques: Empire enters a [4]-turn Golden Age <upon entering a new era>
[+10]% [Culture] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Teotihuacan
declaringWar: Put up little resistance and I may spare more of your people.
attacked: You finally decided to join your ancestors?
defeated: As we lay defeated, our legacy will go down in history. When the last word of your history is spoken, our temples shall still be standing.
introduction: What's this? Another state to join my empire, or a useful ally? Respect my power, and be welcome.
hateHello: You are brave to come here.
tradeRequest: You have something that belongs to me, give it now.
uniques: [+1] population [in this city] <upon constructing [Wonder]>
Allied City-States provide [Food] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Production] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Culture] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Faith] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves

name: Estonia
declaringWar: Your very existence is a threat to Estonian freedom, you must be destroyed!
attacked: I stand for Estonia's freedom!
defeated: All the years I have spent fighting for my people, just to lose independence once more...`
introduction: We welcome you with open arms, just respect our nation and we shall do the same.
hateHello: I will cooperate with you still, just know, I don't respect you.
tradeRequest: What would you like for this?
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Forest]
[+10]% Strength <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Latvia
declaringWar: This is necessary, not for me, nor for my allies, but for my people, so they may live to see another day of freedom.
attacked: I only do what is right for Latvia, if that means conquering you then so be it.
defeated: I surrender on the terms I remain in my place and you remain in yours, it is with hope that you
introduction: I will welcome you, but you must remember, Latvia is for Latvians.
neutralHello: Latvia's sun shines equally over everyone.
hateHello: You? What are you doing here?
tradeRequest: This may benefit the both of us, do you accept?
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] from every specialist [in all cities] <during a Golden Age>
Instantly gain [+15] [Golden Age points] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>

name: Zaire
declaringWar: We are seeking our own authenticity, and we will find it because we wish, even if that means fighting you for it.
attacked: War? I have rendered my country and people an enormous service. They owe me everything, they will die defending my country.
defeated: I am the latest victim of your nation, no longer needed by you, but I am defeated knowing my people died for me.
introduction: The chief is the chief. He is the eagle who flies high and cannot be touched by the spit of the toad. I am he, the chief, President Mobutu. Are you the toad?
neutralHello: What business do you have here?
hateHello: Does my support for you count for nothing?
tradeRequest: In a word, everything is for sale, my country needs this, what is your price?
uniques: [+1 Culture, +2 Production] per [3] social policies adopted
[+10]% Strength <vs [Melee] units> <in [your] tiles>

name: Libertatia
declaringWar: Fer the good o' the people, yer tyranny must end!
attacked: Others've tried... all've failed.
defeated: I die knowin' I fought fer a good cause...
introduction: I be Captain James Misson, vigilant guardian o' the people's rights an' liberties. Tell me, be ye oppressors, or the poor souls they trample?
neutralHello: How fare ye this fine evenin'?
hateHello: Leave this place, 'less ye wish t' perish.
tradeRequest: Got meself a fine offer fer yer consideration.
uniques: Adopt [Freedom] <upon entering the [Industrial era]>
[+20]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all coastal cities]
Earn [50]% of killed [{Military} {Water}] unit's [Strength] as [Golden Age points]

name: The Buccaneers
declaringWar: Ye might as well give up now, 'fore it gets worse!
attacked: I'll send ye t' Davy Jones' Locker!
defeated: Come on then, ye cowards! I'll take ye all meself!
introduction: Ahoy, there! Name's Captain Henry Morgan. Be ye a great ally... or a foe worth crossin'?
hateHello: What be yer purpose here, ye scurvy dog?
tradeRequest: Be smart now, matey. Take the deal.
uniques: [+25]% Yield from pillaging tiles
Earn [15]% of the damage done to [City] units as [Gold]
Earn [25]% of killed [{Military} {Water}] unit's [Strength] as [Gold]

name: Wokou
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be mine!
attacked: I see you are stupid, let's see how long until your nation collapses...
defeated: I will negotiate with you, one last time...
introduction: You have found the base of the fearsome Wokou. If you decide to be peaceful, we shall have no issues. If you decide to be hostile... you will come to fear our fleet.
tradeRequest: There are ways of making people accept deals. You will accept this one, unless you want me to use other methods.
uniques: [+10]% Strength <when fighting in [Coastal] tiles>
[{Military} {Land}] units gain the [Wako Raider] promotion
[1] Movement point cost to embark <starting from the [Renaissance era]>

name: Canton Pirates
declaringWar: Do you think you can stand against the power of the full Red Flag Fleet? Let us see.
attacked: I will have no problems ending your worthless life.
defeated: You have won, I surrender to you.. I will live peacefully under your rule.
introduction: I am Ching Shih, leader of the Pirate Confederation, chief of the Red Flag Fleet. Now who are you?
neutralHello: Have you come to tell me something?
hateHello: Get out of the way, I'm busy.
tradeRequest: I have other ways of getting this...
uniques: [3] Unit Supply per [6] population [in puppeted cities]
[2] Unit Supply per [6] population [in annexed cities]
All newly-trained [Water] units [in all coastal cities] receive the [Raider] promotion <during a Golden Age>

name: Tétouan
declaringWar: I have come to take revenge on you, infidel!
attacked: You wish to make us flee further? Come on then.
defeated: I will never forget nor forgive this humiliation.
introduction: My name is Sayyida al-Hurra, a free woman and Governor of Tétouan. Do you stand in my way?
hateHello: You must be wiser than this.
tradeRequest: There are ways I can get this without your permission.
uniqueName: Pirate Queen of the Western Seas
uniques: [Water] units gain the [Coastal Raider I] promotion
[+1 Gold, +1 Faith] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+15]% Strength <for [Military] units> <in cities with a [foreign] religion>

name: Chichimecas
declaringWar: Your land looks nice for my empire, prepare to die!
attacked: Until your death or mine! Time for you to find out what a REAL war looks like!
defeated: I see it now, my preparations came too late, my warriors were too few... I have failed.
introduction: Where is your courage when standing before I, the mighty Xólotl?
neutralHello: You are welcome, but you are not a friend. Remember that
hateHello: Not now, I am busy preparing for your demise.
denounced: You are not only a fool, but a coward too? I am sure you will have a different attitude when my warriors raid you...
tradeRequest: I will only offer this to you once, accept it.
declaringFriendship: You have come a long way. Do you see me as an friend, as I have come to see you?

name: Mixtecs
declaringWar: I see no reason for your lands to remain outside my empire!
attacked: The dog strikes the jaguar? Foolish defiance! Your name will fade, your lands will burn!
defeated: My demise is soon, yet I still see many who will follow me...

neutralHello: I may have a use for you.
hateHello: Come to beg for my mercy?
denounced: What's this? The dog wishes to anger the jaguar?
tradeRequest: Accept this or not, I will have it soon.
declaringFriendship: I believe you may be of more use to me as a friend rather than an enemy.

name: Tlaxcala
declaringWar: I have no choice, your expansion is too much and it must be stopped!
attacked: Now I shall see, will my allies aid in this war, or must I stand alone?
introduction: My name is Xicotencatl. This land you have found stands defiant, yet surrounded. I ask for your aid in defeating our enemies, and in return, I shall lend you mine.
neutralHello: Welcome to our lands, my friend.
uniques: Militaristic City-States grant units [2] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation

name: Toltecs
declaringWar: Sacrificing animals and blood is not enough for the gods, I have no other choice.
attacked: I have tried everything to help you, yet it has come to this? Unfortunate.
defeated: Who are you? No mere human can destroy my greatness!
introduction: Do you come to bathe in the glory of my empire? I welcome you for it.
neutralHello: My people welcome you, as do I.
hateHello: I will get to you soon.
denounced: I see you are no longer the friend I thought you were...
tradeRequest: I assure you our offer is of the highest quality.
declaringFriendship: I see you now as a friend, do you feel the same way?

name: Wari
declaringWar: There is no escape, I have crushed stronger foes than you. What hope do you have?
attacked: Oh? You will regret this every step of the way...
defeated: My name may fade in history, and my people forgotten with time, but our empire shall be remembered forever more!
introduction: A new face? I welcome you, just do well to stay on my good side...
neutralHello: I trust you come for good purpose.
denounced: Such pride from those who wear masks of strength.
tradeRequest: I do not ask, I demand. What you have belongs to me, give it.
declaringFriendship: There is a war coming, yet it is not with you. There is a way to prevent you from being next...

name: Zapotecs
declaringWar: I tried to befriend you, but it seems the gods had other plans. Now I must destroy you!
attacked: So be it. Your skulls will adorn the tzompantli as a warning to all who defy me!
defeated: I weep for my kingdom that now lay in ruin because of you...
introduction: Cocijo must have blessed us with a new face! I am Guxi Chikoeza, Coquitao of this marvelous land, now who might you be?
neutralHello: You come at a good time, for it is a calm day.
denounced: Your arrogance has sealed the fate of every suspected spy in my territory. Let this be a lesson to you.
tradeRequest: The gods bless this.
declaringFriendship: From when I first saw you, I knew Cocijo had truly blessed us. Please, become our friend.
uniques: Instantly gain [5] [Faith] <upon discovering [All] technology>

name: Azcapotzalco
declaringWar: The gods require more sacrifices! Your deaths will be put to good use.
attacked: You think this will be easy for you?
defeated: I have come to peace with my death, for Mictlān awaits me...
uniques: Comment [[+25]% [Production] when constructing [Land] units [in capital]]

name: El Tajín
declaringWar: I would much rather solve this another way, but this must be done.
attacked: Why do you need war? Let us settle this with a game instead.
defeated: Our independence ends today? So be it...

name: Tlapan
declaringWar: It has been decided, this is the best course of action!
attacked: This will not go unpunished!
defeated: It seems we end here...

name: Cempoala
declaringWar: It has been demanded this happens!
attacked: What treachery is this?!
defeated: We could have been great allies...

name: Cuzcatlán
declaringWar: You have come too close to our lands, war is the only choice!
attacked: You can try, we will resist. Let us see who falls first...
defeated: If you want our arms, you must come to get them from the mountains!

name: Tamtoc
declaringWar: Die! You foul beast!
attacked: I have repelled stronger than you!
defeated: Our culture will be remembered forevermore...

name: Kilamope
declaringWar: The jungle calls for your death!
attacked: You must find us first!
defeated: The land will swallow our civilization whole before you can enjoy this victory!
uniques: [Land] units gain the [Woodsman] promotion

name: Poverty Point
declaringWar: This is a regrettable, yet necessary action.
attacked: I welcome you and this is how you respond?!
defeated: Do you have no respect for this land?

name: Aztecs
startIntroPart1: O divine Montezuma, your people welcome you! May your magnificence inspire all living things! The mighty Aztecs were nomads until the 12th century, when they choose to settle in the mesa central, which would later be called Mexico. Wars were frequent with other tribes to control the rich land surrounding the sacred lakes of Texcoco, Xaltocan and Zampango. In some 200 years, double-sided alliances and martial prowess made of the Aztecs the dominant power in the Central American basin, forming a mighty empire stretching from sea to sea. Alas, the empire fell under the assault of foreign devils - the Spaniards and many curses they brought with them! Wars between tribes and weaponry of doom used by the invaders made the great Aztec civilization crumble in only a few decades.
startIntroPart2: O mighty King Montezuma, do you hear the call of your people seeking for revenge? Will you lead them to victory under the light of the Five Suns? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Xi-miqa-can! Xi-miqa-can! Xi-miqa-can! (Die, die, die!)
attacked: Excellent! Let the blood flow in raging torrents!
defeated: Monster! Who are you to destroy my greatness?
introduction: What do I see before me? Another beating heart for my sacrificial fire.
tradeRequest: Accept this agreement or suffer the consequences.
uniques: Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Culture]

name: Inca
startIntroPart1: King Pachacuti Sapa Inca, maker of the world and ruler of Tawantinsuyu and the Inca people, your loyal subjects greet you! In the beginning, the small state of Cusco already showed the Incans were promised for greatness. They won many wars against powerful enemies, relentlessly crushing any army that dared oppose them, and forged a mighty empire stretching from Ecuador to Chile, the greatest ever seen in pre-Columbian America. Not just undaunted soldiers, Inca people were accomplished builders and artists, their magnificient and unequalled culture still fascinating the world today.
startIntroPart2: O Emperor Pachacuti, honor your name of 'Earth Shaker'! Will you once again summon the power of the earth to unite all Incan people under the protection of Sapa Inca, the Son of the Sun? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! You cannot hope to stand against the mighty Incan empire. If you will not surrender immediately, then prepare for war!
attacked: Declare war on me?!? You can't, because I declare war on you first!
defeated: How did you darken the sun? I ruled with diligence and mercy—see that you do so as well.
introduction: How are you? You stand before Pachacuti Inca Yupanqui.
tradeRequest: The Incan people offer this fair trade.
uniques: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
[-50]% maintenance on road & railroads
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles
